Title: Leap to Faith
Writer: Michael Schur (created by), Christopher Encell, Kate Gersten (executive story editor), Cord Jefferson (story editor), Andrew Law (story editor), Daniel Schofield (story editor)
Actors: Kristen Bell, William Jackson Harper, Jameela Jamil, D'Arcy Carden
Plot: Michael gets a surprise visitor; Eleanor, Chidi, Tahani and Jason try to solve a riddle.
